items.title: War Eagle Mx 2023
items.creator: JSRobinson
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey everyone! It’s been a while. I’ve had this track sitting in my WIP folder untouched for the last few months so I figured it was probably time to just release it. Some of you may recognize this track because it was my first track I put out over a year and a half ago now… Crazy. However this one is completely different, I wasn’t happy with that first one as it honestly sucked and I knew I could do better, another thing is that I grew up riding this track and still do every now and then so it is kind of special to me so I wanted to do this right. So about a year ago I was looking into how to 3d scan a track with a drone but I wouldn’t have been able to make that happen, then I eventually found out about Lidar. This completely changed everything because it gave me a somewhat accurate base heightmap to go off of and just made the whole process way easier. Fast forward a few months and now we have a remaster/remake of War Eagle MX.
(Before anyone says anything about it being called the “2023” version, I started on this over a year ago before they turned the track around and already had a decent amount of hours before that)
Now a lot of this wouldn’t have been possible without the help and support of some friends so this track is dedicated to them. Also… Roll Tide.
HUGE thank you to all my friends and testers

items.title: Mxgp Of Valkenswaard
items.creator: superjoint
items.description:
Description
Downloads
HUGE UPDATE!
Soooo I decided to go back and revisit this map because overall I wasn’t happy with how it turned out. When I originally released this track I believe we were playing with the old tire model which rendered sand tracks almost impossible to ride. As everyone knows, Valkenswaard is an infamous Dutch sand track and for it not to be sand in game ended up being a bummer. The track is kind of tough for 250s and 125s but is still very rideable. I really hope everyone can enjoy this update!
IF YOU HAVE THE OLD MAP CURRENTLY THAN YOU WILL HAVE TO OVEWRITE IT WITH THIS UPDATE!!
Access to the old version has been cut off permanently.
WHATS CHANGED?
-Dirt Type changed from soft soil to sand!
-ground layers have been made thicker so track doesn’t deform as fast as the old map
-cutting penalty changed from 5 seconds to 1 second
-Improved dirt and grass texture
-Heightmap adjustments to compensate for sand traction
-Revised roughness
-Improved track detail
-All new trees and shrubs
-improved skydome
-new objects added

items.title: Poor Boyz Mx
items.creator: MOUSE
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Welcome to Poor Boyz MX! This is my first attempt at track building and I’d love to hear your feedback so I can make better tracks in the future.
There are 3 raceable tracks included – the main motocross track, a pit bike track, and a trail loop that weaves around the map and crosses over the main track. All 3 layouts have 42 pits and 40 gates for maximum chaos. Or you can just chill and mess around in the corn field FMX circuit.
The Main motocross track Is a replica of a private backyard track in Southern Ontario, Canada that I used to ride regularly before I unfortunately had to hang up the helmet. I wanted to create a track for all skill levels to enjoy, so being close to 1:1 scaling its not hard to get over the jumps. The fast guys will separate themselves by how hard they can scrub, and the 450 or factory 250 riders can hit a couple bigger sends that the smaller bikes will have to check up and double. The track layout is true to life with the exception of being widened and scaled up a bit to work better in game. I’ve also added roughness in specific areas and more ruts in the corners in an attempt to eliminate any OP lines and give more useable options during a race. The goal with this build was to replicate the feeling of riding a real life, not perfectly maintained amateur training track. The track was tested on all bikes from the 125s to the 450s and it’s a lot of fun on all of them, becoming more technical the further to the inside you go and the more CCs you roll off the virtual trailer.
The pit bike track isn’t supercross style like you often see but is essentially a worn-down kids motocross track. There are no real designated doubles or triples it just feels more like a neglected kids learning track. I wasn’t planning on making it raceable, but… I tend to get carried away. I’ve found it to be the most fun on the 4t pit bike and cant imagine the chaos with a full gate, but good luck.
The trails are about a 3 minute loop and are a lot of fun on all bikes but especially the enduro bikes. The trees bite, so bring your hand guards. A full gate through these trails could be… interesting.
I have to give a huge shout out to everyone that helped me get the track to a state I was satisfied with releasing.
Objects: Endo, Earthwurx, Red Rider, Fluffy gecko, Cody James, Kellz, Para Moto, GioPanda, and Typical Canadian for the custom shed/deck
Tutorials: TFC, Resolute Kraken, Jesse Mulock, Niko Mouk.
Track Testers: Skilz, Jenkins, Tempo, Sinfulishy, New Guy, Frosty, Typical Canadian, Steeler, Dylan Frisch, Red Rider, Arsenic, Dblu, Ryan Cardno, Calum.
Thanks to iNsane for all he does for the community, and the .pkz locker. Resolute Kraken for his amazing track builder and PiBoSo for the game.
If I forgot to mention anyone I’m sorry, there’s so many of you and my brain is mush.
And an extra special thanks to Frosty, Typical Canadian, Jesse Mulock, Red Rider, Baked Minotaurs, Kruegs, Endo, and the EarthWurx discord for putting up with my constant questions, my usually self-caused issues, and taking the time to help me get this completed.  I would have given up on this a long time ago if it wasn’t for you.
Server layout names for Dedi hosts:
Motocross track- leave blank
Pit Bike track – PB
Trails – Trails
Enjoy!

items.title: Wolf Creek Mx
items.creator: D.Alves Mods
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Instructions
It’s been a while since last time I released a track (it’s my common phrase I guess), so I decided to finish and release one of the tracks that I have sitting in my folders.
This track is meant to be a fun and easy track. But even if it is “easy” to ride, it isn’t a sweet task to be the fastest guy around because it has its own challenges. It’s almost wide-open track with elevations and big jumps to send nasty whips. It has 50 pits and 38 gates. Yes, it has 38 gates instead of 40 because the space we have fits only 38 and we commonly have races with 30 people max for performance wise. I recommend setting the erode around 1 if you have up to 10 people on the server, if you have more you can mess with it, and I would suggest setting between .5 and .8 depending on how many people are playing.
NOTE: IF YOU HAVE FRAME DROPS, CHECK IF GRASS AND TRACK SCREENS ARE DISABLED ON GRAPHICS SETTINGS!
Both enabled you see screens and grass, but you may have some frame drops.
Both disabled you won’t see screens and grass, you may have a better performance.
I hope you guys enjoy it!
I want to thank all the people who made my life easy with tutorials, assets, knowledge and testing.
Earthwurx, RedRider, JV, Logan, Dblu, Kewin Feula, StoneRider
– Help, Support, Information, Knowledge.

items.title: 2023 Malvern
items.creator: Jonesy
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey guys, this project came about mainly because I wasn’t happy at all with the originial Malvern I made. Lucky enough for me, they change their layout up a little each year, and this year the layout utilizes a little more of the terrain and elevation of the property. If you’re not familiar with the track, it is a local track here in east-central Ohio that regularly holds a series of night races (and the occasional day race). If you have played the older track, this one should feel quite a bit different. Textures, heightmap, objects, layout, everything is new and updated, as well as the scaling and map size are bigger to accomodate mxb physics. The track is a little on the darker side as I was going for a early evening sort of vibe.
A couple things: a huge thank you to Superjoint for helping me get the LiDAR data and animated flags in game, as well as helping me test and providing feedback and some vehicles to use. Some other assets I used were provided by Giopanda (markers, toilets, tents), TFC (water truck that has been re-textured), Agitato (parts of his banner pack), Red (tents), RK (trackbuilder) FredMX (skidsteer). There is some flickering with some of the banners at a distance but stops when closer up. I tried everything to get it to stop but unfortunately couldn’t. The track has 30 gates (unfortuntately, I tried to squeeze 40 but couldn’t), and 40 pits.
If you have any interest in what the actual track looks like, here is great GoPro video from Jeff Holub during one of Malvern’s summer night races from this year with the updated 23′ layout:

items.title: Kellz E Street Mx
items.creator: KeLLz
items.description:
Description
Downloads
E-Street MX Park
Today I release another local track of mine, E-Street MX. E-Street is Located in Marysville, CA Right next door to MMX Racing. I have built MMX Main in the past so I decided I would throw the MMXX Sand on this release, giving you all two new tracks to race and battle on. The Main focus of the track was E-Street. As you get on the track if you have rode there you will notice it’s rougher than a normal practice day. I’ve made this pretty rough and with alot of line to choose from to create the best racing expeirence possible for each skill level. The MMX Sand being the easier of the two tracks is still a ton of fun to just hold it wide and battle with your friends….Also down the road I plan on recreating both of these with current layouts from 2023 as well.
Hope you all enjoy all the hardwork and man hours put into this by not only me, but everyone involved.
Features
⦁ 40 Rider Gate and Pits(Both Tracks)
⦁ 2 Raceable Race Tracks (E-Street/ MMX Sand)
⦁ Track cams for E-Street MX
⦁ E-Street 2018 Layout
⦁ MMX 2018 Layout
Special Thanks
⦁ RedRider197 for Starting Gates, Water Truck, EZ-Ups, Bleachers, and for answering my many questions.
⦁ Each and everyone in the Earthwurx Discord have been nothing but helpful to me. Without all the smart people in there I probably wouldn’t be progressing. The work they put out makes me push to create better tracks. Thank you to all of you
⦁ JV for the optimization help. Without that the track would not run nearly as well
⦁ Insane for all he does for the community
⦁ OEM Team for all the hard work they put into making this game better
⦁ Kewin Fuela for Assets Pack
⦁ TFC for all of the tutorials, without them I wouldn’t have ever started building tracks
⦁ PiBoSo for the game

⦁ Navo for being the best commentator and because he needs to start creating tracks again
⦁ Cody James for Helping me Create a Tree Asset Pack
⦁ TheFluffyGecko for FMX Ramps
⦁ Jesse Mulock for answering all of my questions
⦁ ParaMoto910 for His Campers
⦁ Brxghtside for the screenshots
⦁ Resolute Kraken for MXB Track Builder and How to animate Title Image
⦁ Dylan44Frisch for his Large Billboard
__________________________________________________________________________________
Special Thanks to everyone that pushed me to release this. If it wasn’t for you guys this track wouldn’t have gotten a release date, like so many of my projects.
Also a Special Thanks to Twitch Goons Racing, EX Crew, Skyyy, Calum and Everyone else that tested and gave great feedback

items.title: Hazy Hills
items.creator: StoneRider
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey everyone, I’m very happy to share this new track with you all. I’ve spent a lot of time on this one. I built it for myself first, I wanted a spot where I could just run laps after laps and improve my skills without behing bored. I hope you will like to run hotlaps after hotlaps as much as I do.
Despite the insane amount of work i’ve putted into this one, I decided to release it for free for the only reason of seeing it flood the servers. I want everyone to enjoy this one, and I hope it’s not too hard for it to enter the Tracks Hall of Fame…!! 😛
Now a few words about the track itself. It is a pretty technical supercross track slapped on a motocross layout with elevation. It is really fun and flowy but it’s also pretty hard and techy. You gotta take your time to learn your way around this unique features. You can race it with your friends but it has been made mostly for solo training. Just do laps, let the deformation do it’s thing and enjoy while seeing your skills go STONK.
Thanks to RedRider and D.Alves for some of the objects !!

items.title: Hemonds Mx Sawmill
items.creator: ItsTheKruegs
items.description:
Description
Downloads
So after this Track being on my PC for about 6 months and not touching it for months. I have finally decided to finish it up and release it for hopefully everyone to enjoy. This Track is very heavily inspired by a local track here in Maine called Hemonds MX and Offroad.
However it is in no way a replica
, as I have changed things and added features for a more fun flowy aspect. This is The sawmill track, there are 2 tracks on the property but I sorta got busy with other projects and IRL things and never finished the second track. Eventually down the road I will probably rebuild The second one completely and finish the track and update this. But for now I just want to take a break from this project and work on other things. This is my first Actual release of a track. Have been doing track building for some time but never released anything yet. There are things that I would have done differently on this and maybe will change if I decide to update it. Such as I can model A LOT better now and may have changed a few things etc. I and plenty of friends have had fun on this track so decided to release it to the public.
I would suggest taking a few slow laps to understand the track a bit before throwing down heaters. There are a few sneaky tight corners and a few wall jumps that will throw you off at first. The track is fun and rides well on all bikes as well. I prefer the 250 myself but there are a few fast 450 lines. I also put 40 gates because why not, gotta have some chaos sometimes.
Big special thanks to
Tbell
for showing me everything track making wise the past 2 years. Without him I probably never would have known where to start.
Extra credit to,
Moto237- Being the main track tester since this build has started and constantly giving me feedback
All the boys on Satori for helping run test laps and races to get everything sorted
Cody James and Kellz- Trees
RedRider- Gate asset
And plenty of other friends over the past few months who have put feedback in on the track build

items.title: Sa Enduro Park
items.creator: PricePlayze1033
items.description:
Description
Downloads
SA Enduro Park
So, I have been working on this for a few months now and I honestly can make so many minor tweaks to it… But for the sake of getting it out there I have decided I am done!!! Although there are no rocks and logs I will be working on that between now and my next post so there will be an update and you will see the reason why this update is necessary in a few months… (;
What to do???
You can explore the South African terrain and enjoy the hills and scenery which includes dried up rivers, hills, dams etc. You can explore the woods where a bunch on trails meet up some take you up the hills and some take you to the lower parts of the park but wherever you are there’s always a location to go and explore and play around in!! Race the loop with your friends and enjoy the sound of nature in the trees!!! If you bored of the main loop go make your own and ride on it with your buddies!! Try to make the most difficult trail out there and let me know if you found one!!!
Credit where credits due
Lynds-For showing me this game in his awesome videos!!!
Redrider-For his awesome assets!!
GioPanda-For arguably the best assets mega pack!!!
MoukLab-For some of the best tutorials on objects etc.
TFC-For the very helpful tutorial series
Resolute Kraken-For the Track builder helper
If I missed anyone, please let me know!!!
Enough waffling around here is some preview pictures!!!
Hope it’s fun!!! And please let me know your thoughts in the comments
-Price

items.title: Ohio International Raceway Remastered
items.creator: Jonesy
items.description:
Description
Downloads
So I know this might not be something that everyone will appreciate, but for those of us local to OIR and not able to ride the track this summer due to some ongoing legal issues, I felt like now would be a good time to go back and apply some of the things I’ve learned since I posted this as my first track back in December. Over the past 6 weeks or so this has been a passion project of mine to update this track and do it some justice. I have re-worked pretty much everything except for the base heightmap, which to my surprise was pretty good. Additionally, that track and link is being retired for this one.
Things that have changed:
All textures (except for grass), including normal maps
All new objects, foliage, trees, watering pond, skydomes etc.
All new ruts and roughness, including added off-track berms on insides to try and stop cuts
There are 2 different skydomes for sunny, cloudy/rainy environments, including added wet textures for rainy conditions
Timing gates, cameras, etc.
Additional gates (40) and additional pits (45)
I would also like to say thank you to those that helped or have provided free objects to use, including Red (water truck, tents), FredMX (skidsteer), and Superjoint for vehicles, and overall thoughts and opinions.
PS: If you ever been to OIR on a Sunday for open practice, then you’ve most certainly had your picture taken by Rich (mxfreakspix) who provides some great pictures for free because he loves to do it.

items.title: Rolling Hills Mx
items.creator: Jonesy
items.description:
Description
Downloads
So after having made a couple replica tracks, I decided to try my hand at a “fantasy” track. I wanted to make something that was fast, had longer sweeping corners, and overall felt less congested than your typical local-cross track (lap times will be in the mid-2 minute range). This track also served as a testing site to try out some new techniques, as 99% of the track was built in Gimp. The track is not all that difficult; I added a moderate amount of roughness coming into most of the corners. Likewise, the track was tested using 1.6 – 2 erode, so it should handle more than that pretty easily. For OGs of the game, this isn’t anything new, groundbreaking, or exoctic. The textures and track features were influenced by many of the tracks I ride and visit in Ohio and Pennsylvania — meaning you’ve probably seen these types of textures 1,000 times. Nevertheless, I do feel the track is pretty fun and I have put a ton of time into testing it so hopefully you enjoy it. The insides are marked by Acerbis stakes and checkpoints are just to the outside of the stake, while corners that do not have stakes around the outside, the berm will serve as the outside of the corner. There is also a 40 rider gate, with 45 pits.
A big thanks to those who have provided assets for the community to use: Red (water & dump truck, tents, semi) Fred MX (skid steers), and Gio Panda (Acerbis stakes), RK (track builder), Agitato (Red Bull tent, spongebobs, 100% inflatable, track archway), I Shot Tupac (vans), all other assets were modeled by me.

SandPit MX
v2
SandPitMXv2 is an Deep sand track designed for 125cc and 250cc. With equal lines, gradual breakdown, and improved lap times, it provides a challenge. Set in Arizona’s dune environment, it features rocks, palm trees, cacti, and more. Recent upgrades include a matching background, refined object placement, heightmap touch-ups, and deform rework.

The Layers below are Soft Soil giving good traction and allowing for more speed as the ruts, breaking bumps and new line choice slow you down.

items.creator: HurrenMX
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Big Air Motocross is a replica of a local track by me, located in Newaygo, Michigan. Although this track is named “Big Air”, the jumps are not very big and it is 1:1 scaled to real-life using LiDar technology. I made sure to widen the track a little bit to make the racing a bit better.
The track has 30 gates and 40 pits, this is also a sand track so use sand tires.
Cameras are not currently in this version but will be added later, I ran out of time after running into some complications prior to posting this. However, I wanted to have the track out by May 25th as announced.
This track was being finalized as the new OEM v0.18.1c update came out, it has not been tested on them.
Gate models by RedRider197.
Thanks to FatmuppeT for help with my flag.
Follow my Instagram @HurrenMX to stay up-to-date on all my custom track content

items.title: Kellz Unadilla 2022
items.creator: KeLLz
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Instructions
UNADILLA 2022
So today is the day I finally release my version of the famous AMA National Unadilla Located in New Berlin, NY. I spent a lot longer on this build then I should have but in the end I think it came out just as I intended it to.
I chose this track as it’s one of my favorite on the circuit.
That being said, this is not an exact replica of the track. I have never had a chance to see it in real life. So this is my best shot and making a my own version of this race track for Mx Bikes.
Hope you all enjoy all the hard work and man hours put into this by not only me, but the track testers, assets creators, and the few that helped with object textures. Thank you to each and everyone of you.
Features
⦁ 40 Rider Gate and Pits(Both Tracks)
⦁ 2 Raceable Race Tracks (Main/ Sand)
⦁ Track cams and Flaggers for both tracks(Track Cams are not a strong point of mine so if they aren’t the best I apologize)
⦁ Mx Track 2022 Layout
⦁ Fantasy Sand Track (where AMs  track is located)
Special Thanks
⦁
Red
Rider197
for Starting Gates, Water Truck, Dunlop Tire, Semi Truck, EZ-Ups, Bleachers, and for answering my many questions.

items.title: Warren County Speedway
items.creator: jaye
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Howdy bikers, I’m back with another one
(:
Have you ever looked at an oval track and thought, “what this needs is even more danger” – then I have the track for you! The idea came about after seeing the oval in Diablo county. Originally I didn’t even bother starting, but it just kept nagging at the back of my mind until I finally relented and here we are! I used the namesake track as a base layout, in Indianola, Iowa (and made it bike friendly) seeing as this track raced with cars in all the media I saw, I added bigger berms and a jump to hopefully facilitate some intense over/under crossings. There’s also a bypass to the jump if you don’t have the speed to clear it (though you risk colliding with bikes coming the other way!) This is a fairly small track overall, despite the speeds. Measuring at a total of 340 meters, a quick lap time for me (riding a cr250) was 15.8-16 seconds. Track has a total of 28 pit stalls/start gates, so get your friends together!
Many thanks are in order, again:
TFC, for the tutorials (This map wouldn’t exist without your videos!)
Agitato, Giopanda, Rosshell, and Redrider197, for their trackside obects and arches
Resolute Kracken, for the wonderful track builder helper
Thank you all! I wish you all a very chaotic race <3

Hey dudes, so this isn’t a normal track post, obviously. A while ago, a bunch of track creators did a 4 hour track build competition hosted by the man himself, Lynds. This was my entry into the competition where I ended up coming in second behind one of the best to ever do it: ENDO. I never released it because I didn’t feel like it needed to be released. Tbh, nothing has changed, I don’t think this is worth releasing, but I have been away from MXB for a solid 4 months and I miss it, and I really just want to share my 4 hours of mind numbing work that would’ve went unplayed forever (which it probably should, but whatever). Well that’s about all. Thanks for all of the support, thank you for an awesome run on KI Tracks, and I guess I’ll see you guys sometime!

items.title: Loket Mx
items.creator: jaye
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Instructions
My first track!
This started as a replica of Loket’s mxgp layout, before I found out Sloofa already has a beautiful version! (go check it out if you want a
proper replica of this track
) So in the interest of bringing something fresh, I took the liberties to use the same overall layout (track path, elevation should still be close ish on track at least) and to bring my own creative flair to the features, roughness, and textures! I don’t really know what to label it as, seeing how its half replica – half fantasy.
Most of my testing was done on a four stroke 250, with 3-5x erode (I love how this track erodes, the thumbnail is after 10ish laps on 5x erode) 125s shouldn’t have too much of an issue handling the track, 450s feel a bit overkill to me.
I hope you enjoy your time spinning laps here! Please do share your feedback, I’m looking for ways i can improve my track building!
Many thanks are needed:
TFC, for the tutorial and skies (This map wouldn’t exist without your videos!)
Rosshell, Agitato, and Ruubs, for their trackside obects and arches
Resolute Kracken, for the wonderful track builder helper

items.creator: bakedMinotaurs
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Instructions
What’s up everyone!
Welcome to the Minotaur Compound, located somewhere in the deep woods of Florida. This is a fantasy track that was created off the top of my head. It was unplanned, and I kind of winged it. I wanted to go for the backyard moto track vibe with a fun flowy track.
Its not perfect, but hey, I tried. There are some nice booters, including a massive table and a Laroccos Leap style triple step up, both 4th gear wfo on a 250f. The track is mainly wide open and fast, but there are some technical aspects as well. I feel like there is a pretty decent skill gap, where beginners and more advanced players can both enjoy.
40 gates & pits, ready for you to shred. Hope you enjoy!
-bakedMinotaurs

items.title: Desert Sands Raceway
items.creator: eraaks212
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello Everyone,
After 10 tracks created, this one was a lot of fun to make. Inspiration was simple, build an all-sand track that races well. While sand is not 100% perfect in game, I hope you like the track. This was truly a collaborative project with help from the mx community for testing, tips, and assets. Thank you all for your contributions on this project as this is what made it so fun to build.
Located in somewhere in the desert mountains is this fantasy track. The track has some roughness and ruts built-in, multiple lines, 40 rider gates, and a large triple uphill jump that will test 250f HP. Flow is key on this track and sometimes the slower line can produce big sections afterwards. There are numerous sections with rollers in and out of corners to help create different lines/timing.
Track perimeter is outlined by yellow tires, if you stay between them, you will not get cuts. If you do not, you’ll get a time penalty. Track has working Trackside and Pitlane camera’s along with Marshals. Collisions are active; Soft for the SpongeBob’s, Hard for the perimeter fencing.

items.title: Malvern Mx
items.creator: Jonesy
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey guys, I’ve been slowly working on this for the better part of a few months. Malvern is your typical local Ohio motocross track with a little bit of elevation, some fast sections, as well as some tight off-camber sections. It’s been home to numerous Loretta’s qualifiers and has been a staple of the Ohio mx scene for years. The layout is mostly from the 2022 season, with the 2021 connecting straight back on to the finish (I just preferred it). The finish line triple is quite large and easily doable on a 450; however, on a 250f you’ll need to pretty much grease the corner before to get it.
A big thanks to those who have provided assets for the community to use: Ruubs (trees), TFC (water truck), Phantomz and Fred MX (skid steers), and Gio Panda (banners, Acerbis stakes, tents), Ryan Cardno (garages), Cody James (stands), Noxo (tents), RK (track builder), Red (semi), as well as Jeff Holub who provided the GoPro I heavliy relied on to build and shape the track. I doubt Jeff plays MXB and will ever see this, but if he does, thanks! The GoPro can be found below if anyone is interested in what the real-life track looks like:

Hi Everyone,
Welcome to BP73 Moto Ranch! This track is a private training facility for FXR Racing Inc.  The Race Track proudly hosts the annual Ride with Ryan Dungey Foundation Event featuring Ryan Dungey. In 2022, Ryan used this track to train for and during the outdoor season. www.bpmotoranch.com

items.title: Top Deck
items.creator: shadeywadey
items.description:
Description
Downloads
https://youtu.be/pkUv13hjDI8
Welcome to Top Deck!!
“How cool would it be to have a track on an aircraft carrier?” Several months ago, Vibin In Hawaii asked us that question. JS Robinson soon found a good 3D model of an aircraft carrier and he and I got to work trying to make this idea come to life. However, there was a big problem we had to find our way around. We couldn’t figure out how we were going to set up the heightmap so there wouldn’t be huge, ugly dirt walls covering the sides of the ship’s hull. So we moved onto other projects for the time being since we couldn’t really think of an answer at the time. Fast forward to late October, I learned how to animate objects, and when I animated water with moving waves I knew I had to make this idea work. I found out the solution to our problem was a lot simpler than we thought; just put the ship’s hull under the heightmap. This prevented me from being able to use the entire deck of the ship for the track, but I figured I’d find a way to make it all work. After a few months here it is, Top Deck. The answer to the question “What would a motocross event look like on an aircraft carrier?” I had a lot of fun and learned a lot making this project, and I hope you have half as much fun as I had making it 🙂
DISCLAIMER: MAKE SURE THE WIND DIRECTION IS SET TO NORTH, OTHERWISE ANIMATED OBJECTS WILL NOT BE IN THEIR PROPER LOCATIONS
I don’t know where to start with who to thank first for this project
JS Robinson – Going halves on the ship model and testing
Burrito – Track layout design, various ideas for the project, starring in release edit, and testing
Fatmuppet – Blender wizardry and early troubleshooting
ENDO – Textures and help with early troubleshooting, starring in release edit
The Stateline HRC Team – Being a great group of test riders, early troubleshooting from Razzles, MadcapDunker starring in the release edit, and being a great group to play the game with
Brady, Sorru, TechnoPottzy – Testing, starring in the release edit
EarthWurx – Always excelling as an amazing source of information for track building
RedRider – Testing, texture help
Mouk Lab – Starting gate troubleshooting
Resolute Kraken – Making track building easy for dummies like myself with your great builder tool
PiBoSo – Giving me the run down on how to animate objects, this track wouldn’t seem nearly as alive without it
Most of all, you for checking out my track! THANK YOU!! ENJOY!! 🙂

items.title: The Moshpit Indoor Pit Bike Racing
items.creator: HurrenMX
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Welcome to
The Moshpit
– an indoor pit bike track designed for maximum fun and excitement with your friends. The track is designed with supercross-style obstacles to test riders’ skills and keep them on their toes. The Moshpit is perfect for pit bike enthusiasts who crave a thrilling ride in a controlled environment. Whether you’re an experienced 110cc rider or just starting out, this track promises an unforgettable time for those who are looking for something a little different than your casual track.
IMPORTANT! PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING:
This track is built for the 4-stroke 110cc bikes, NOT the 2-strokes. You can download the pit bike pack here:
https://mxb-mods.com/ptibike-full-pack-include-2t_125cc-pittrack
A lot of people seem to have issues downloading the pit bikes, all you need to do is replace your current ‘mods’ folder with the ‘mods’ folder in that pit bike pack, doing that will sort the folders accordingly. Do not place the pit bike ‘mods’ folder inside of your current one, just drag it into your window to replace it – you won’t lose any files. This method has worked every time for me and I had all my beta testers do the same.
From there, place the track file into the ‘Pitbike’ folder under ‘tracks’, NOT your motocross/supercross/enduro etc.
ADDITIONAL TIPS FOR HANDLING THE 110s:
Cornering is the trickiest part on these bikes so avoid using your front brake, it’s super buggy and you will knife the front end – use the rear brake.
Sometimes leaning back when turning sharp will help keep the bike from knifing, other than that, don’t make such sharp turns on the 180 corners.
You will rarely need 3rd gear except for the start straight, you can hit some of the bigger lines at the top of 1st gear.
YOU CAN DOWNLOAD MY UPDATED
RESHADE PRESET
HERE:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C3jTLacYxl6DA7TaDOlriSXwwNC4ETvH/view?usp=sharing

items.title: Billy Goat Ranch Wip
items.creator: bakedMinotaurs
items.description:
Description
Downloads
UPDATE 2/18/23: This is it y’all. Finally wrapped up this project which has taken somewhere around 150 hours of my life. Hope everyone enjoys it. I was planning on releasing this in a few weeks because I just released 2 tracks this month, but the anticipation is killing me.
I made some changes to the main track, nothing major. The woods loop has been completely redone, I tried to make it more flowy and such. The centerline on the track isn’t too strict, as I wanted to keep the feel of it not being too regulated. Some tighter sections where you can almost double around corners are where you’ll find it being stricter because I didn’t want people just cutting the track. Lap times for me (I’m pretty buns at the game) were around 3:10-3:15 which I can imagine some of the better players coming in sub 3 minutes. I’m not sure what track in the game has the longest lap times, but this has to come close.
I still plan on adding to the compound, you’ll notice an unfinished track off in the distance. So more updates will come. Thank you to everyone for the kind words when I released the WIP version. Especially Lynds, Troyjann, & Ianmx. Don’t know how much further I would’ve gotten if it weren’t for that.
For some reason, it won’t let me add updated pictures to the post
Thanks to:
TFC- Skies & track tutorials
Cody- Beautiful trees pack
Everyone in Discord that helps answer my questions
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hey everyone, hope yall are having a good day. This is my very first attempt at creating a compound/track. Very early stages but wanted to get this out and share with you this little gnarly piece of Florida.
This is a Florida sand track. If any of you Florida boys know ex-pro Mike Picone, this is his practice track. It’s basically built in a huge sand pit. Super rough and gnarly. I grew up riding this track and felt the need to replicate it. It’s not an exact replica, but its probably close to 85%.
The track contains a full blown sand track, a turn track(unfinished), and a woods loop(unfinished). I will eventually be adding in a free-ride area with some floaters and then possibly an arenacross & supercross track.
No objects or centerline yet, still have a lot of work to do.
Huge thank you to TFC & Resolute Kraken for their track tutorial series, Snappe for all the track creation files
I’m really happy how the track has turned out so far, and am excited to get this project wrapped up

items.title: Reddick Mx Florida
items.creator: bakedMinotaurs
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Instructions
Update 2-16-23: Made some slight changes to the SX track
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
What’s up everyone! Back again with another Florida track. This is Reddick Motocross, or Motocross of Marion County.
If you raced in Florida within the last 15 years then you should know this track really well. Reddick hosted the Gold Cup series, Winter Ams, Florida Series and many other series throughout the years. Unfortunately people have to be jerks and complain about noise, so the track is shut down. This track was arguably the best track in Florida for many years. I just want to keep the memory alive by bringing the track into MX Bikes.
These tracks break down super nicely imo so putting deform between 1-2 seems to be perfect, allows breaking bumps to form better & ruts as well
There are 2 versions of this track, the main motocross version and the small supercross version. The sx track is ok, I didnt spend as much time on it as the main track, but you should still find some enjoyment out of it.
Also, I didn’t reinstall my reshade since I got a new pc so if the track textures are too bright try turning off reshade
To install them, open the zipped file & drag both the reddickmx.pkz & reddickSx.pkz into your track folder
I want to take the time to thank;
TFC- tutorials, track assets (water truck, skies)
Ryan – Garage Pack
Phantomz – Skid Steer
Giopanda – Track Assets (track markers, tent)
Cody – Trees pack (THE REAL MVP HERE)
Everyone on discord, Typical Canadian, Jesse Mulock, Ruubs, Red, everyone. Without the help from y’all none of this would be possible
If I forgot to thank anyone, I am so sorry. Please call me out so I can adjust the post
Any issues please let me know and I will work on fixing it. Thanks for checking it out and as always, stay baked B)
P.S. : I’m finally motivated to finish Billy Goat Ranch, so be on the look out for that compound to be finished soon!

Here is my first full track release for any game so it is far from perfect but however I am pleased enough with it to release it as it is (or I never will). This track was pulled from lidar data, the layout was 2020 so I had to change some sections to make it the 2022 Revo MXBG layout, so some parts may not be perfect.
I tried to make  the track as realistic as possible but creating more than 1 line choice in corners. The shading on jumps and ruts are far from perfect as L3DT will not let me draw my layer masks on (lovely error codes) so I have decided this will suffice for now.
Normal version and server version included, also my shader preset,
I hope you enjoy!.

However, I have never been to this track as I live in the US, so for the riders in the UK, let me know how this turned out!

WELCOME TO WAVYCROSS 2: BACKWOODS SX!
Wavy again! With yet another BANGER!
WAVYCROSS 2: BACKWOODS SX
is a supercross track set in the back country on some private land. Whoever owns this land has dug out a supercross track for us to rip on! He even added a little special feature that I believe is pretty WICKED! You can even go under the feature for a different line! Of course it wouldn’t be a
WAVYCROSS
track without a track jump 😉
Enjoy this lap! It wasn’t perfect, but it shows off the track 🙂

TEST YOUR SKILLS
on this somewhat technical, but rather easy track, once you get the flow!
I’ve decided that I will be doing a
WAVYCROSS
series as bookmark tracks of me getting better and better at track creation. So every so often another
WAVYCROSS
will be dropping in between other track releases! They won’t have any real correlation to each other as track personality goes, other than the staple “Track Jump” in each one. it’s going to be whatever idea I have next!

items.title: Inz Sx
items.creator: Inz
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Please read description first!
After a couple hundred hours of trial and error I’m stoked to release this track to you all. This is my first track in MXB and was meant to be a realism backyard SX track somewhere in the mountains. The track layout and scaling is tricky and definitely leans more towards pro level. The textures are meant to be realistic and erode adds more detail to the track surface so don’t be scared to crank it to 5x + erode. I hope you guys enjoy and feel free to provide any feedback – There will be more to come!
Additionally Whoever posts the fastest time in video format to discord
here
will be immortalized on the record board for the next track release. You will also get an early link to the next track to set a new time for the board. There is no set deadline as it relies on when the next track is ready for release.
Currently Hurlz holds the fastest lap with a 1:03.0.
I want to give a big shoutout to

items.title: Ki Tracks
items.creator: dylan44frisch
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Update: Never new Google Drive limits downloads til now, thats a good thing I suppose! I added a MEGA link.
Hey all! Welcome to KI Tracks, a semi-replica of a classic midwestern track which sadly closed its doors in 2018. This compound features a main track, 2 sand tracks, a pitbike track, “pp track”, circle rut, figure 8 rut, and a trail loop that tours the entire facility! The only raceable track is the main track with 24 gates, but 40 pits to have each track populated in the same server. This is more than likely my last track release, and it’s been a ton of fun making tracks for you guys and seeing people enjoy my tracks. It makes me so happy to see people recognize my growth in track building. I can’t wait to rip it up with you guys, thanks for letting me share my creative outlet with you all.
Keep a look out for easter eggs, they’re everywhere!!!
There are so many people that I credit with helping me out with this track. If I forget anyone, I apologize, you know who you are!

Howdy yall.
I’ve created a replica track here of my childhood MX track. This is Center Road MX as seen in 2008. A somewhat technical track with steep shallow berms and a good mix of jumps that need to be hit flat out and some that need to be checked up for. items.title: Briarcliff Mx
items.creator: Jonesy
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey guys, while stuck in Ohio I worked on another classic track found only in…Ohio. Briarcliff is a well-known Ohio track that has been home to numerous Loretta Lynn’s qualifiers. While I live a couple hours from Briarcliff, I’ve never actually been there. So with that being said, I relied heavily on GoPro footage, Google Earth, and other images to recreate this replica. The track seems to go through regular changes so this is mostly the 2022 layout, with the ’21 roller section at the end being added (felt it was more interesting than just another double-double section). The start straight is at a bit of an angle in real life and I did my best to taper it off with the rest of the track for this replica. Overall, the track is shorter than OIR and can be tricky remembering the layout as there are a couple rollers/wall jumps that can catch you off guard, otherwise I feel the track flows really well once you get the layout down. I’ve also scaled the jumps up a bit just to work better with MXB physics.
Also, big thanks to those who have provided assets for the community to use: Ruubs (trees), TFC (water truck), Phantomz and Fred MX (skid steers), and Gio Panda (banners, Acerbis stakes, trees), Ryan Cardno (garages), Agitato MX (start board), Noxo (tents), RK (track builder). I also modeled a number of assets in Blender for this track, however, it was only my second time using Blender so [please keep that in mind. I did try my best. As you’re reading this, I am probably already at work on another classic Ohio regional qualifier: Malvern MX ’22.

items.title: Stoned Mx
items.creator: Wavy2Faded
items.description:
Description
Downloads
WELCOME TO STONED MX!
GRAB YOUR SMOKE! LETS GET FADED! 🙂
Here is the creators GoPro Lap! 1’37.690. It could definitely be faster! A lot of time to be made, but I didn’t want to make it too hard on  everybody 😉 Good Luck!
https://cdn.mxb-mods.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/1672390929-untitled-video-made-with-clipchamp-1.mp4
Track Preview
https://mxb-mods.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/1672391175-stoned-mx-edit.mp4
Hey guys! Wavy again, with yet another track release!
Stoned MX is a track based on the property of a grow OP. Based in a secluded desert area somewhere in the world (Use your imagination.)
Stoned MX is a Intermediate/Pro Track. I say pro, because the roller sections are relatively hard. Passing in the roller sections is so satisfying! Every section of this track is possible, it just requires very finesse stick movements. I tried to make this track have a lot more lines than my first one. I’m still learning and will continue to learn. At least the track isn’t flat this time! I tried to use more of the map to make different levels of height to refrain from using the Wall of Trees. Let me know what you think! Any kind of feedback is greatly appreciated! Also the Skybox will be different than what you’re seeing in the videos. The recordings were made during track development.
Once again, thank you everybody for the track assets! They are such a huge help for beginners!
Leave a comment on this post, and tell me why you think there are so many roller sections on this track!? 😉
I also recommend the shader presets from the Netherlands MXGP track! It really makes this track POP!
P.S.
The song used in the track preview is actually me. I’m an artist as well, I’ve been taking a break and chilling out for the holidays learning some new and different stuff. let me know what you think of it! I have added 2 different versions of the track. One with The song at the starting line and one without. Your choice!
!!!!! IF YOU WANT TO RECORD THIS TRACK FOR YOUTUBE, DONT WORRY ABOUT COPYRIGHT, I OWN ALL RIGHTS TO THE SONG. YOU HAVE MY PERMISSION TO USE IT !!!!!!
P.S.+
There are freeride lines scattered through the track for you freestyle/bike life people!
I just gave up on the banners. I know some of them are in the ground, but I kept having to redo them. Not very many spots, but just ignore the spots that do 🙂
This is the track after final touches 🙂 The background has been Color Changed, so it ties in with the track!

items.title: Jgr Mx Test Facility
items.creator: MLessig46
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Welcome to the Joe Gibbs Racing Motocross Testing Facility, Located just north of Statesville, NC. The JGR MX Race team has trained at this location from 2007 until 2020.
This facility featured 2 supercross tracks and an outdoor national track, I decided to put in a Vegas style track in place of their smaller supercross track. Also added is a trail with some enduro stuff on it, I figured why not, let me know if there’s any problems with those objects. There are a lot of trees, I started out with 5000, then dropped it to about 750, I tested it on a laptop with a 1060 and was getting between 60-90 fps, and 160-200fps on my 2080ti. If there are enough complaints about low frames ill drop the tree count.
I hope you guys enjoy as this is my second released track, people seemed to like Goat Farm so maybe you’ll like this.

items.title: Mxgp Of Imola 2019
items.creator: rossHell
items.description:
Description
Downloads
UPDATE V2 “LOW” version
Hi everyone, so here is finally the new “low” version of Imola 2019 which is now running much better..
Unfortunately
I was not able to keep compatibility with the previous version, so you’ll have to download it again
. Sorry for that.
What did change:
Changed heightmap resolution from 4k to 2k
Scaled down track, skymap and objects’s textures to 1K or less
Scaled down and merged track masks when possible
Removed all collision except some few exception
Removed some useless 3d objects
I also took the opportunity to make other changes which are not related to performance
Changed track id to
2019.mxgp.imola.ros
to be compliant with the standard (Thx Niko, this time I have watched your video with more attention)
Orientation of the sun has been modified according to the skymap, so the track textures can looks different but that’s only due to shadow orientation which has changed
Due to the scale down of the heightmap the track looks a little bit less detailed but I think it remains acceptable.
There are now an additional “minimalist” version, which contains less 3d objects, in case you still have issue with FPS. But I hope the standard version should now run smoothly (not less than 100 FPS) for almost everyone. The new size of the track is now 453 Mo, instead of 950 Mo previously so it’s more than 50% less size and I think the quality is still acceptable, but I’ll let you judge about that.
Let me know in the comments if you still having any issue. I really hope everyone will be able to enjoy this track now.
The download links have been updated with the new versions.
Hello Everyone,
Here is my second track, a replica of MXGP of Imola 2019.
I spent a lot of time on it and tried to improve the quality compared to my first map Faenza 2020. Some new assets have been created especially for this track, they will also be released soon on MxbMods.
This track contains a lot of 3d objects and some high resolution textures, so you may need to reduce quality in the graphical settings for having better fluidity. It’s also heavy, almost 1Go (but already reduced by 400Mo by usig DDS textures instead of TGA).
It’s actually running on 8yr old computer, with GTX 970 graphic card, so I guess it should be ok on almost all configurations.
I hope you will enjoy it and have some good rides on it !
Let me know your feedback in the comments

This compound has been about 90% finished for the past few months. Finally got a drive to finish it and here we are.

Welcome to Ricky Carmichael’s 2011 test track Which is now known as the Star Racing Yamaha Test Track.
This is the first track I have created and posted to MXB Mods; I have created some other ones but never felt like they were worth being released. Let me know what you guys think about it, give me some feedback, opinions, pointers, anything that you think would improve the track! I might be changing some of the jumps and turns for a more updated/quality build. Some of the turns and ruts are not the best, but like I said it is my first released track and trust me they are better than what I have created before.
UPDATE: I have reworked some of the turns and jumps on the main track as well as made new mask and textures for it. I have completely wiped the old supercross tracks and built a new Supercross track and an Arenacross style track. I also added the iconic water truck, thanks to tfc!

items.title: Eraaks 212 2023 Sx Prep Part 2 Rounds 10 17
items.creator: eraaks212
items.description:
Description
Downloads
PART 2 Updated with Object Fix 10/25/2022
PLEASE READ FIRST!!
Hey everyone,
Submitting a fun project for the mx bikes community. The purpose of this track is for us looking forward to the 2023 SX season to begin to have a map to train on. This is in NO way trying to replace the “Ride the Track Map” series. It’s for fun to have Rounds 10-17 on ONE MAP.
Important information:
ONLY ROUND 13 has live timing.
There is 40 gates/pits only so that we can have many people on the map at once. There is 40 gates (2 sets of 20) on Round 13 track.
All Rounds can be ridden on 250’s & 450’s.
There is camera’s, mostly around Round 13
There is working marshal’s
There will be limited objects/texture features. I did add non-collidable tuff blocks to Round 13. It is what it is everyone. Have fun!
Want to support me? How about getting a track in return too? If you haven’t downloaded my 212 Moto Ranch yet you can support me on the MX Bikes Shop.
https://www.mxbikes-shop.com/downloads/212-moto-ranch/
.
I won’t be doing timing for all 8 rounds. Unless there is overwhelming support from the community to want more. Let me know in the comments!
Special Thanks to:
Red Rider, Agitato, and Giopanda for the objects
Resolute for the Resolute Track Builder Tool
TGR, TKO crew for testing the track out!

items.title: Shadeys Backyard Freeride
items.creator: shadeywadey
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Track edit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xs1GLWuloes
Well, here I am again, with my second track/map!
Here is my Backyard Freeride. What started off as a simple spot made strictly for an edit without any plans of release became a full blown project that I felt you all would appreciate. Snake Creek was my way of learning the process of making tracks in general, and this was a learning process focused on what I can do in blender and track files to make as detailed of a map I could make in 2-3 weeks time.
There is something for truly everyone, from those just starting freeride, to seasoned veterans of this side of MXB. This was mainly made using the 250f for testing, but there are a couple jumps more aimed towards the 450’s.
Just like last time, I don’t even know who to thank first.
FatmuppeT for your blender/ track animation knowledge and help with just about everything in general.
Higgo for assets, being a good tester and positive motivator.
ENDO for textures, various blender knowledge, and testing.
The EarthWurx discord for being my library of references, assets, and everything else track building. You guys rock!
Lynds for his great showcase/review, please check it out if you haven’t already!
JSRobinson, BurritoChancho, Panicrev, MadcapDunker, Spuds30, Razzles126, OG Soul Rider, Vibin In Hawaii, Hatter, and the rest of the Stateline team for being great testers, coming through and starring in my edit, and being a great support/play group to advance my abilities in all aspects of the game.
Most of all… YOU for checking out my track, THANK YOU!! 🙂

Axell Hodges Slayground | X Games 2022 Replica by Slabz 710
350-450F HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
This project has taken me 4 months to complete, I hope everyone enjoys it as much as the Just Goon It Crew. This took Uncountable hours between Great friends and I.    Thank you Boys! 🍻
When i first started building the map I was Replicating the Slayground 3 video from YT, then when X Games 2022 happened I Revamped it real quick for a FMX Comp Vibe.
-Freeride / Main line (from Slayground 3) / Jib / Competition Area / Pit Bike Competition Area
Recommended Reshade for the track – HurrenMX Reshade (accessible in his HurrenCompound Link)
Anyone Using Reshade experiencing Bad FPS, Please Choose a Different refresh rate to get Black screen, Accept New Resolution then Frames should be fixed Or Download an older version of Reshade
Any Input Kindly Leave down Below. (Telling me I suck does not help me, Define the problem) Maybe i’ll be inspired to make a V2..
Slabz Thank Yous

items.creator: AZDesertRat
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Here’s my 1st track release for MX Bikes. AK Farms was a popular local cross track in New York state that closed down circa 2015.  This rendition was created from 2013 lidar data with several sections reimagined for MX Bikes. There are 40 gates (2 rows of 20/ea), which should make for some chaotic fun. All feedback is welcome and will be utilized if an update is needed.  Hope you enjoy!
Shout out to Heatwave, SmokinJo & nike23 for play testing and lot’s of constructive criticism during the build process
.  Also want to give credit to Ruubs & Resolute Kraken for quickly responding to my noob questions on Discord. Lastly, thanks to PiBoSo & Snappe for continual development of such a great game.

items.title: Glacial Gears Arenacross
items.creator: Spuds30
items.description:
Description
Downloads
What’s up Everyone! I’m super stoked to share this track build with you! It has been a while since my last track upload (Compound 30), so I wanted to share/give back to the community by releasing this track for free. This project was a 2 week build that was inspired by a real track, located in Andover, Ohio, called NEMX (shut down in 2013). I changed the outdoor scenery/environment to give it a fantasy track feel, which I thought would be better for the game. Glacial Gears was intended for all skill levels. I didn’t make the tough blocks have collisions, for newer riders to try and learn Arenacross/Supercross without having to be punished for every mistake, as well as trying to keep the rhythm sections tame, yet do-able for new comers. Don’t be fooled though, there are PLENTY of big lines for pro players. Each rhythm section has 2-3 rhythm lines that are pretty equal in speed.
I really hope you guys enjoy this one! I can’t wait to show you some other bigger projects that I have in the works. Cheers! – Spuds30
Special Thanks!
–
Endo Creations
– This dude is basically my professor. He puts up with the thousands of questions I ask him while trying to improve as a creator, as well as providing some of the best laughs while doing it. He’s provided me with a ton of textures/objects as well. Enjoy your track building retirement bro! (I’m still going to ask you questions lol)
–
Razzles126
– constantly testing/giving feedback as well as bouncing ideas off of eachother for our builds.

items.title: Competitive Edge Mx 2009 Wip
items.creator: Immovabledust
items.description:
Description
Downloads
THIS IS A EARLY ACCES BUILD OF THE TRACK
Reason for the early access release is I will unable to work on this for a few months or less and just want to get feedback to work with when I get back
This is my firs track for mx bikes. It is a replica of Competitive Edge MX in 2009. I used to work there as a equipment operator and flagger for about 2 years. The track not quite 1:1 but close enough for the fun factor.
This is one of many layouts we had during 2009-2010, IF you rode there when it was in a different layout I will consider making additional layouts after I 100% complete this layout first so please don’t tell me my layout is wrong this is the one I am using because I am the most familiar with this one. I tested this in VR so some of the ruts may be small in some corners(VR makes it easier to hit them).
-Known Issues
Center Line may be a little offf
Black abyss surrounds the track(has no effect on the track its self just dont ride off the edge of the map)
Track file has 2011 instead of 2009 in it so dont be alarmed when you unzip and the year is different
No Cameras positions have been added
The models I created ie Tower and Hay bales are just place holders so are the default track textures

items.title: Somerset Valley Mx
items.creator: Razzles126
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Somerset Valley MX is a fantasy track I created with features that I feel are both technical and fun for all skill levels. The name Somerset comes from the town Somerset, PA. I drove past Somerset on the Pennsylvania turnpike when I’d make trips home to visit my family while I was serving in the military, and the landscape was amazing. So I decided to make a track that I could imagine being in the valleys of Somerset.
My main focus when creating this track was on flow. I wanted multiple lines, some sneaky jump lines, and technical sections that will make or break a lap time. I originally  had a rougher version but found that the track worked better with alittle less roughness, allowing you and your buddies to make some lines of your own!
A
HUGE
thank you to everyone who helped make this possible!
Endo Creations
– Nearly all my objects, and tons of tips and tricks to help me complete my vision.

items.title: Redwick
items.creator: RedRider197
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey peeps!
Today I’m finally able to bring you Redwick!
This is a project I started at the beginning of the new year. As some of you may know, I built tracks for MVA Reflex (modding community) and Redwick was a fantasy track I built/released in late 2020. This version of Redwick has changed a fair amount due to MXB physics but I believe this to be the best version of Redwick and I’m in love with how it turned out. That said, the track difficulty is most likely intermediate to advanced. Take some time to learn the track and the sections and eventually it will feel very flowy.
I have a lot of people to thank for all the support and questions I had during this new track making endeavor. I’ll be honest, I knew I needed something new but I didn’t know if I would be able to do it or be successful at it. I’m glad I made the move though and I’m here to stay. Enjoy!
DON’T FORGET TO DOWNLOAD THE SCAVENGER HUNT TO GET THE HINT ON HOW TO UNLOCK THE MULLET!
****MULLET GOES IN PROTECTIONS FOLDER****
.
Preview Video:
https://youtu.be/ePoI7_7juDM
Programs used for track creation
Quixel mixer (
Great program for making track textures)
Substance painter (
Amazing program to texture my assets)
3ds max (
My preferred choice for 3D modeling atm)
Daylon Leveller (
Sexy 3D height map modeling program
)
Photoshop (Additional Height map modeling, compiling/making textures and everything else related to Artwork)
3D Assets
Majority by myself (Many community assets coming soon)
CGTrader and Megascans for Train, Rocks, Plants and Trees. (usually have to reduce poly count for MXB)

items.title: Steel City 2012
items.creator: Razzles126
items.description:
Description
Downloads
********UPDATED*******
Fixed: TRACTION TO ADHERE TO BETA 17 TIRES, ENJOY! – Razz
What’s up everyone, stoked to release my FIRST ever track, I hope you guys like it! – Razzles126
2012 themed Steel City Raceway in Delmont, Pennsylvania (USA). This track no longer exists but was a major part of the AMA Pro Motocross Championship. Created by myself @Razzles126 being local to this track makes this very special to me!
Be ready to be challenged because this track has many off camber turns, and some turning sections that take patience to traverse.
This is NOT a 1-to-1 scaling but close. This is also a hybrid of 2011 and 2012 with more of the 2012 features though.
Special thanks to all the Stateline Honda members and close friends for helping with testing:
-Spuds30, Madcap, Hatter, Undefined media,  Hunt Claps, OG Soul Rider, and many more!
Also thanks to D-Blu for behind the scenes help!
ENJOY!

items.title: 2014 Toronto Supercross
items.creator: Cody James
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello all
This is my version of the 2014 Toronto supercross.
This is my first track that I am releasing and a precursor to the hillside compound that I am currently making.
I am not a pro track maker so the track is not the worlds best, but with help from some awesome people I think it turned out as good as my first track could.
Id like to Thank
Logan-Getting me started on everything by teaching me how to make heightmaps in photoshop, and dealing with my stupidity.
Red Rider- Gates and SO much help with textures and models, and dealing with my stupidity.
Kewinfeula- Providing me with most models, and dealing with my stupidity.
Everyone in the greatest discord ever that is “Earth Wurx” for helping me with my million questions and dealing with my stupidity.
Resolute Kraken- His amazing tool and helping and dealing with my stupidity.
Mulock 22- Help with timing gates and dealing with my stupidity.
Kuakky-A Beta tester than turned this track around, helped me so much with sizing and making more lines possible.
TypicalCanadian-Another great beta tester
Alpha-Another great beta tester
Gio Panda- Objects
Slabz- Emotional support
Dylan Frisch- Emotional support
If I forgot anyone I apologize. There have simply been so many people helping me its hard to keep track of everyone <3
I tried to make this track as much as of a replica as I could. From what I know there is only 1 line that James Stewart was doing in the long section that is not possible. But other than that you have a wide selection of lines.
(Please dont launch the double into the whoops <3)
For the Server Version
Just open the folder to find the PKZ. I put it in a folder so I could upload it to MediaFire since it has the same name as the normal version and would override it. 🙂
Thanks for dealing with my stupidity
I expect no donations, but if you wanted to show me some love a simple follow on
insta
or sub on
youtube
would do the trick!
And you will get a sneak peak at my coming projects.
Enjoy

items.title: North Carolina Motorsports Park
items.creator: wjp14
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello everyone, I’m proud to release my first ever track build, a track I used to ride back in 2014. The main track is not an exact replica, I went off the current 2022 layout but made some of the jumps and berms bigger than real life. There was a bunch of open space surrounding the main track and I didn’t want to leave it empty, so I just started building tracks around it. Any constructive criticism is greatly appreciated!
I want to thank my teammate KeLLz for teaching me how to use basically every program needed to make a track (L3DT, Gimp, and Blender), building the NCMP house, and sharing his fences with me.
Thank you to Resolute Kraken, Agitato and TFC for the great tutorial videos.
I want to also thank TFC, Giopanda, RedRider197 and Agitato for the track objects.
Note: The track file is named NCMP 3.pkz, if you remove the 3 the track will not show up in game.

items.title: 2022 Tampa Mx
items.creator: dylan44frisch
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Edit (10.6.22): No update, just added the download link back.
Hey guys! I’m back with my 5th track release, and this one is special to me because it is my home track where I ride, race and coach other riders. Tampa Mx was my first ever track build last year. With how much this track means to me, I wanted to come back and do the track the best justice I could. This started out as a small project where I would just change around some textures and assets, but the more I would play around the hungrier I got for this project, and it turned into a full rebuild from the ground up. I have been working on this track for about 3 months now and I can finally say that I am proud to present this track to you guys. This track is pretty demanding on the PC, so I have included a potato version. If you are a content creator, I give you full permission to use my track for content, but please use the full version.
There have been many people who have helped and supported me through this process, so if I forget anyone, please forgive me.

items.title: Mc Trebitz
items.creator: TillBen8
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Next Track is now finished!
I first had ideas of remaking all my old tracks (Wipfelgucker needs it the most), but that will take some more time…
Planned for the next projects are the MSV-Kühns Höh e.V. (Tautenhain) and a Enduro Track to expand my skills.
But now to Trebitz:
The RL Track is in Trebitz, Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany
Its a very technical, slim and challenging track.
The crew of EUC Racing already had the chance to test it and give feedback, thanks for that to them!
The Assets are all from Giopanda, but im not really shure if I will stay with them :
This and my other tracks can be also downloaded directly on my website (new content is there also earlier available)
Remember that the Track Derection can be confusing. You wont be the first doing the track backwards (neither virtual nor analogue).
Yeah my uncle did it irl until my dad told him the right way 😉
So long for now, enjoy some pics in this post, then the track and then the summer weather!
I will grab some holiday and will be back with new content for you guys at earliest two weeks!

items.title: Terrafirma Pro National
items.creator: eraaks212
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello Everyone,
This track is my first non-replica track. I picked a random hillside and designed the track using the terrain. I used some different techniques to build this track which is intended to be more like a national track. There should be some good roughness and ruts that are intended to provide options and difficulty. Lap times should be within the 2:38-2:48 timeframe for most riders. Track features 40 pits/gates, sand whoops, large booters, and numerous uphill/downhill sections. The track should be good for both 250 and 450 racing.
Big thank you to the Mx Bikes community for help. Most notably TFC, Resolute Kraken, RedRider197, Agitatos, Giopanda, and Mouk Lab for the tutorials, tools, objects, and discord help. Thank you also to the numerous test riders.

Downloads
Hey everyone,
Releasing a replica track for Round 2 of the Australian MX Championship.  Track is located in Moree, Australia and holds many races throughout the year. There was a tight deadline to get this released for the series and it will continue to evolve for next year’s round 2 race as well.
UPDATE: Made some revisions to the starting gates. Fixed the cuts on first lap completion.
Link to the series is here:
https://discord.gg/ta2Dtq2qev
The track itself has little elevation but does feature many big jumps and tricky sections including sand. There are multiple lines in many corners and should be good for racing. Many thanks to the JuicedOut Motosports team for all the testing put into the track.
Lastly, thank you to the track building community. Most notably TFC, Resolute, Agitatos, Giopanda, and Mouk Lab for the tutorials, tools, objects, and discord help.

items.title: Bcmx Adventure Park
items.creator: eraaks212
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Sharing my 4th track for Mx Bikes. This replica track is of BCMX Adventure Park located in Cambridge, MN.  The track is soft soil and features many offset turns. I’ve recreated the track as-is with the exception of a couple sections where I’ve either added jumps to make it more enjoyable or made them doubles instead of tabletops.
There is rough and great deformation that you will notice after spinning a couple laps. I’ve made the options in the turns close to the same timing to create some racing opportunities. The berms won’t hold you if you blast them so you may need to use some technique. I had a great time building this track and hope to see some good racing online!
The track also includes a hybrid supercross track where the minibike track usually is as well. The trees have collisions as does the perimeter fence and flag stands, tents, spongebobs, and buildings.
UPDATE: By popular demand I’ve changed the gates and pits to 40. Thank you to all the streamers filling their lobbies for races on BCMX.  Update your files by deleting the old and putting the new PKZ in your tracks folder. As always, remember to use your brakes in that first turn 😉
Lastly, huge thanks to the Mx Bikes community for help. Most notably TFC, Resolute Kraken, Agitatos, Giopanda, and Mouk Lab for the tutorials, tools, objects, and discord help. Thank you also to my test riders featured on the track signage.
Thank you all for the positive responses. I really appreciate it.
After

items.title: Huckleberry Meadows Sx 2
items.creator: OG_SOUL_RIDER
items.description:
Description
Downloads
You ever ride a track backwards and think to yourself; “Man this track is almost better backwards…”? Well, when I rode my first version of this track backwards, I thought exactly that….
So I flipped the track around, rebuilt it, changed it to a night track, new skybox, added a few more details, and retextured it. When making this the goal was multiple lines for good racing, track features 22 gates with 24 pit stalls. Racing under the lights is always more fun. While doing this project I’ve leaned I need to upgrade my graphics card to make bigger and better tracks.
this track wouldn’t have been possible without;
ENDO for helping me with textures, texture masks, testing, and overall help.

items.title: Motofactory Compound
items.creator: Jones_797
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Welcome at the MotoFactory Compound, the home of MotoFactory.
The Compound includes a huge Motocross track (2750m long),  Supercross, Freeride, Freestyle, a Forest trail area and a turn track under the trees.
Tip –> Add Wind at your weather settings for waving Flags!
Big thanks to MotoFactory, because they hit Janes and me up to build the track for them. So it was a payed project.
If you want your own track, hit me up.
Big thanks goes to Janes46 as well, he build the SX track and mades the overall masks, texturing and the skydome.
I build the MX track, the freeride, the turn trail, the forest trail and the whole the natural environment.
Most Objects like trees, bushes, the bridge, flagpoles and the banners are build by my own.
We started building the compound in oktober last year. Because of the beta 17 update nothing flowed anymore an i had to improve with different soils. The SX track is since beta 17 really challenging on a 250 but you can hit all big lines as well.
Thanks to:
– Motopatrol Films for the epic Trailer, texturing the Teamtruck and the banners
– INSANE for beeing always a good lexicon and this page.
– Ruubs, for helping me getting flags waving if you add wind
– Resolute Kraken for his Track Builder Helper, which makes life much easier
– Niko Mouk for the truck model and giopanda for some assets

items.title: Vetmx Compound 2
items.creator: dylan44frisch
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hey Guys!
This is my fourth and biggest facility yet. I have been on and off grinding since November, and I have been so excited to share it with you guys. I did want to do a solid amount more with it, but my girlfriend and I have just moved in, and with IRL racing and real life happening, I don’t have the time to put in as much as I did, however I am happy with where it is at. There is a main track, pro supercross track, ametuer supercross track (AX), and a free ride area. Everything in this facility IS 250-able, but with a sick setup and dumb amounts of runup depending on what it is, but it is definitely a 450/500 playground. It is a 40 man gate, and 40 man pits, so all your friends can come out and ride. Also, I am 100% aware of it being WFO. It is what my friends and I enjoy playing so it will resemble Sky Is The Limit a lot. Hope to see you guys out there!
Veteran Mx is a program that I am a part of that is for US military members and veterans as a way to build a community around motocross. This is my tribute to them.
There are so many people to thank for everything in this track from just raw help, to assisting me and straight up making me assets, and I couldn’t do it without you guys. If I forget anyone, please forgive me lol.

items.title: 2022 Russian Championship Borodino
items.creator: Maxim Barancheev
items.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello everybody!
So, its the first track making in MX Bikes from Maxim Barancheev and Kirill Nikitin. As many guys know, we are long time with MXS community, so much content was made by ourselves (MXsON, 2019-2020 RCH, WMS 2019-2021, many teams etc..), and now we decide to help MXB develop this game.
Of course, track isnt perfect as it should be, but we need more time and more practice and tracks will be on high level.
This track is the replica of the Russian track “Borodino” located in Moscow. Not a hard pack, but not a sand too, something between. Raced so much there, when were young. Track is super fun and comfortable to chill 🙂
All feedbacks will be appreciated. Will be glad to here as positive as negative opinions and may by some lessons, what to change in the future.
You can watch preview video of the track!

items.title: Stateline Private Sx
items.creator: Razzles126
items.description:
Description
Downloads
THANKS FOR CHECKING OUT THE STATELINE “PRIVATE” SX TRACK! – Razzles126
What to expect:
This is my first Supercross track I’ve ever attempted, so if the scaling is not to spec, I’m sorry! This track started as an idea that quickly turned into a reality! I wanted to make an SX track that was challenging yet rideable. Some sections have a risk to reward factor, but for the most part you can flow the race lines pretty well. This track is both 250 and 450 friendly, however the 250 seems to reign supreme here. Expect lap-times to be under 1 minute, and anything closer to a 50 second lap is MOVING!

items.title: Fernley Sandbox 2
items.creator: Mulock22
items.description:
Description
Downloads
IT’S HERE!
{“Source” : “GeForce SHARE”, “B64” : “eyJEUlNBcHBOYW1lIiA6ICIiLCAiRFJTUHJvZmlsZU5hbWUiIDogIiIsICJTaG9ydE5hbWUiIDogIiIsICJDbXNJZCIgOiAwfQ==”}
The Fernley Sandbox is
READY TO RACE
. This is my home track, away from home. I started this project back in July as a passion project. There was a lot of heat and drama going on when I started about the possibility and likeliness of the track closing. It was almost a guaranteed shut down going into September. Thankfully the clubs (OTMX and OTHG) and the city of Fernley were able to work out an agreement to keep the track open!
Fernley, Nevada is a little city about 40 miles east of Reno. Exit 48 (you’ll see the Walmart and Terrible’s Truck Stop). Left under the freeway. Left after the truck wash (if you hit the sand you’ve gone too far). Follow the road until you find the entrance at the next freeway underpass. The Sandbox has been around for decades with probably 100s of iterations, run by the two MX clubs who share the property; Nevada Old Timers MX and Over The Hill Gang – Reno chapter.
{“Source” : “GeForce SHARE”, “B64” : “eyJEUlNBcHBOYW1lIiA6ICIiLCAiRFJTUHJvZmlsZU5hbWUiIDogIiIsICJTaG9ydE5hbWUiIDogIiIsICJDbXNJZCIgOiAwfQ==”}
So here is the compound
. Contained are
four raceable tracks
. Two MX. Two GP. And a ton of
not so hidden
easter eggs. The 2012 Sandbox GP, 2013 East and West MX tracks, and 2015 Sandbox GP.
For all you bieklyfe wheelie wierdos, there are even roads to rip.
Go adventure around and discover all the hidden tracks and trails!
All three weather options are flushed out with drastically different skies and ambiance. All tracks have working cameras. CUSTOM PIT spaces,
please don’t run into my truck it’s still being paid off.
This absolutely would not be possible without EVERYONE who helped me along the way.
Objects – Agitato, GioPanda, Paramoto, Everyone in the EarthWurx discord (if you’re a track builder, look into it),
Testers – GreenLenux, Higgo, Cody, RedRider, Ruubs, Reso, Insane
Frens – You know who you are, and everyone else there’s no way I could fit into this
The discord(s), forum, wiki, tutorial vids, everyone who’s answered my questions, helped me with technicalities, kept me coming back to this
project,
asked for progress updates
And OF COURSE the main man himself Piboso for the game!
